languages.text: "Подобающий финал". {n}Маражай презрительно фыркает и бросает на вас взгляд.{/n} "Я закончил. Полагаю, теперь мы можем перейти к важному — найти то судно, о котором талдычил Аребенниан, и заняться Иремерисс".

"A fitting end." {n}Marazhai snorts contemptuously and looks at you.{/n} "I am finished here. I trust we can move on to important matters: finding that ship the Arebennian kept babbling about and dealing with Yremeryss."
languages.original_text: "Подобающий финал". {n}Маражай презрительно фыркает и бросает на вас взгляд.{/n} "Я закончил. Полагаю, теперь мы можем перейти к важному — найти то судно, о котором талдычил Аребенниан, и заняться Иремерисс".

traits.locale_text: "A fitting end." {n}Marazhai snorts contemptuously and glares at you.{/n} "I am done here. I trust we can move on to the important part, finding that ship Arebennian kept babbling about and dealing with Yremeryss."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "A fitting end." {n}Marazhai snorts contemptuously and glares at you.{/n} "I am done here. I trust we can move on to the important part, finding that ship Arebennian kept babbling about and dealing with Yremeryss."

traits.locale_text: "A fitting end." {n}Marazhai snorts contemptuously and looks at you.{/n} "I am finished here. I trust we can move on to important matters: finding that ship the Arebennian kept babbling about and dealing with Yremeryss."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Une fin digne de lui, » {n}déclare Marazhai avant de se tourner vers vous, un sourire méprisant sur les lèvres.{/n} « J'en ai terminé. J'imagine que nous pouvons désormais nous consacrer à des affaires plus importantes : trouver le vaisseau dont parlait l'Arebennian et s'occuper d'Yremeryss. »
languages.original_text: "A fitting end." {n}Marazhai snorts contemptuously and looks at you.{/n} "I am finished here. I trust we can move on to important matters: finding that ship the Arebennian kept babbling about and dealing with Yremeryss."

traits.locale_text: « Une fin digne de lui, » {n}déclare Marazhai avant de se tourner vers vous, un sourire méprisant sur les lèvres.{/n} « J'ai terminé. J'imagine que nous pouvons désormais nous consacrer à des choses plus importantes : trouver le vaisseau dont parlait l'arebennian et s'occuper d'Yremeryss. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “恰如其分的死法。”{n}玛拉斋轻蔑地哼了一声，看着你。{/n}“我这边的事情已经处理完了。我相信我们可以办最重要的事情了——找到那个独角一直念叨的那艘飞船，解决掉伊芮梅莉斯。”
languages.original_text: "A fitting end." {n}Marazhai snorts contemptuously and looks at you.{/n} "I am finished here. I trust we can move on to important matters: finding that ship the Arebennian kept babbling about and dealing with Yremeryss."

traits.locale_text: “恰如其分的死法。”{n}玛拉斋轻蔑地哼了一声，瞪着你。{/n}“我这边的事情已经处理完了。我相信我们可以办最重要的事情了——找到那个独角一直念叨的那艘飞船，解决掉伊芮梅莉斯。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「ふさわしい終わり方だな」{n}マラズハイは軽蔑したように鼻を鳴らし、あなたを睨みつけた。{/n}「ここでの仕事は終わりだ。次の重要な問題に移れるだろう。アーベニアンがベラベラ話題にしていた例の船を見つけ、イレメリスに対応する」
languages.original_text: "A fitting end." {n}Marazhai snorts contemptuously and looks at you.{/n} "I am finished here. I trust we can move on to important matters: finding that ship the Arebennian kept babbling about and dealing with Yremeryss."

traits.locale_text: 「ふさわしい終わり方だな」{n}マラズハイは軽蔑したように鼻を鳴らし、あなたを睨みつけた。{/n}「ここでの仕事は終わりだ。次の重要な問題に移れるだろう。アーベニアンがベラベラ話題にしていた例の船を見つけ、イレメリスに対応する」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ein passendes Ende." {n}Marazhai schnaubt verächtlich und sieht dich an.{/n} "Ich bin hier fertig. Ich hoffe, wir können uns jetzt wichtigen Angelegenheiten widmen: das Schiff zu finden, von dem Arebennian sprach, und uns dann um Yremeryss kümmern."
languages.original_text: "A fitting end." {n}Marazhai snorts contemptuously and looks at you.{/n} "I am finished here. I trust we can move on to important matters: finding that ship the Arebennian kept babbling about and dealing with Yremeryss."

traits.locale_text: "Ein passendes Ende." {n}Marazhai schnaubt verächtlich und starrt dich an.{/n} "Ich bin fertig hier. Ich hoffe, wir können jetzt den wichtigen Teil angehen, nämlich das Schiff zu finden, von dem Arebennian immer geredet hat, und uns dann um Yremeryss kümmern."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Un final apto». {n}Marazhai resopla desdeñosamente y luego te mira.{/n} «He tenido suficiente. Confío en que podamos pasar a lo que de verdad importa: buscar esa nave de la que tanto farfullaba el Arebennian y ocuparnos de Yremeryss».
languages.original_text: "A fitting end." {n}Marazhai snorts contemptuously and looks at you.{/n} "I am finished here. I trust we can move on to important matters: finding that ship the Arebennian kept babbling about and dealing with Yremeryss."

traits.locale_text: «Un final apto». {n}Marazhai resopla desdeñosamente y luego te mira.{/n} «He tenido suficiente. Confío en que podamos pasar a lo que de verdad importa: buscar esa nave de la que tanto farfullaba el Arebennian y ocuparnos de Yremeryss».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Hak ettiğini buldu." {n}Marazhai, tüm kibriyle gülüp sana bakıyor.{/n} "Bu iş de oldu bitti. Artık daha önemli meselelere geçebiliriz herhâlde. Mesela Arebennian'ın anlattığı o gemiyi bulup Yremeryss'in icabına bakmak gibi."
languages.original_text: "A fitting end." {n}Marazhai snorts contemptuously and looks at you.{/n} "I am finished here. I trust we can move on to important matters: finding that ship the Arebennian kept babbling about and dealing with Yremeryss."

traits.locale_text: "Hak ettiğini buldu." {n}Marazhai, tüm kibriyle burnundan gülüp sana bakıyor.{/n} "Bu iş de oldu bitti. Artık daha önemli meselelere geçebiliriz herhâlde. Mesela Arebennian'ın anlattığı o gemiyi bulup Yremeryss'in icabına bakmak gibi."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
